A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Last Jedi has ruined / ended my 40 year enjoyment of George Lucas' Star Wars franchise.  I will not see another Disney SJ Wars movie.  I gave Force Awakens a chance\, and it delivered a reasonable performance for the SW franchise.  Rogue One was a wasted 2 hours\, the last five mins. were the only thing worth watching.  Last Jedi leaves massive plot holes and unanswered questions\, SJW messaging ridiculously over-the-top\, no connection whatsoever with any character.  Rebellion survives or First Order wins....it's meh\, whatever.  Don't waste your time / money on this Disney money-making fiasco.
